titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a collection of the rules of the committees of the Senate.
A resolution authorizing the printing of a collection of the rules of the committees of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the printing as a Senate document of a collection of the rules of the Senate committees.
